channel.title: Need a Development team
channel.description: Ok so as the subject of this topic said, i am sarting a development team. These are the open spots: [Server Tester] For Bugs ect [Coder] Knowledge of a rsps, however many years you have [Advertiser] Advertises the server for more players. "Must be good" --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Those are the only open spots and here are the server details: Pretty much made from Project DungeonFest so credit to him. Its a server working with 639. The Features for the server are as follows: Fully working pvp Overloads Summoning Chaotics torva vine whip fullscreen/hd Etc. ------------------------------ There's more but i dont wanna spend a hour on here adding them. ---------------------------------------------------------------- If you wanna be a part of this you must have SKYPE, a mic is recommended but not needed. Here is the template for you to follow to enter to be a part of the dev team. ------------------ Name: Skype Name: What Role You Want: Java Experience in d/m/y ( Days, Months or Years ): Why You Want This: Age: How Active You Are: (if a coder, i want proof of skill) --------------------- Apply and help with this wonderful server ( :

item.title: Need a Development team
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Dj_:

Ruby quit repeating shit thats previously stated for post count…

Why take the time to restate whats been said when you can just quote?

Read full topic

item.description:

I can [Advertiser] for the server as-well i can make a Forums/website for it.

item.title: Need a Development team
item.dc:creator: @dubble0jon dubble0jon
item.description:
@dubble0jon wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:7, topic:436914”][quote author=dubble0jon link=topic=539628.msg3950082#msg3950082 date=1332209785]
i would use pics,but im in need of a coder to get the server working, im new to windows 7, and for some reason getting the server online is harder (or im doing something wrong)
[/quote]
same as any other system. Linux is 10x harder, and i got one running in 10 min.

Just look up tuts on portforwarding, thats most likely your issue.[/quote]

Nope, my ports are all open =) thats not a problem for me, i get compiler errors, on all of my sources lol

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Development team
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:7, topic:436914”][quote author=dubble0jon link=topic=539628.msg3950082#msg3950082 date=1332209785]
i would use pics,but im in need of a coder to get the server working, im new to windows 7, and for some reason getting the server online is harder (or im doing something wrong)
[/quote]
same as any other system. Linux is 10x harder, and i got one running in 10 min.

Just look up tuts on portforwarding, thats most likely your issue.[/quote]
Its good that your doing it via linux cause in many companies they host via linux so you’ll be a pro at using it for when you get a job (:.
I should use linux but windows is better for games and I don’t need linux tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Development team
item.dc:creator: @dubble0jon dubble0jon
item.description:
@dubble0jon wrote:

Ok so as the subject of this topic said, i am sarting a development team.
These are the open spots:
[Server Tester] For Bugs ect
[Coder] Knowledge of a rsps, however many years you have
[Advertiser] Advertises the server for more players. “Must be good”

Those are the only open spots and here are the server details:
Pretty much made from Project DungeonFest so credit to him.
Its a server working with 639.
The Features for the server are as follows:
Fully working pvp
Overloads
Summoning
Chaotics
torva
vine whip
fullscreen/hd
Etc.

There’s more but i dont wanna spend a hour on here adding them.

If you wanna be a part of this you must have SKYPE, a mic is recommended but not needed.
Here is the template for you to follow to enter to be a part of the dev team.

Name:
Skype Name:
What Role You Want:
Java Experience in d/m/y ( Days, Months or Years ):
Why You Want This:
Age:
How Active You Are:
(if a coder, i want proof of skill)

Apply and help with this wonderful server ( :

Read full topic
